//: ENEMY ROSTER OVERHAUL: Expanded the enemy roster to introduce more strategic variety and clear threats. Rebalanced existing units to better fit their intended roles.

scout.//: ROLE: Early-game speed check. Tests map coverage and punishes slow-firing towers.
scout.name: Scout

grunt.//: ROLE: Generalist. The baseline enemy that makes up the bulk of early waves.
grunt.name: Grunt

tank.//: ROLE: Health sponge. A straightforward test of the player's raw damage output.
tank.name: Tank

runner.//: ROLE: Late-game speed threat. A pure test of map coverage and high-velocity projectiles.
runner.name: Runner

guardian.//: ROLE: Armor wall. Requires sustained fire from armor-shredding towers to take down. IMMUNE TO SLOWS.
guardian.name: Guardian

bomber.//: ROLE: High-priority strategic threat. Forces focus fire due to its devastating base damage.
bomber.name: Bomber
